definitions.definition: An addition or annex to a group, set, or total.
definitions.example: The poem was a new inclusion in the textbook.

definitions.definition: The act of including, i.e. adding or annexing, (something) to a group, set, or total.
definitions.example: The inclusion of the poem added value to the course.

definitions.definition: Anything foreign that is included in a material,
Any material that is trapped inside a mineral during its formation, as a defect in a precious stone.
A nuclear or cytoplasmic aggregate of stainable substances.
An object completely inside a tissue, such as epidermal inclusion cyst, a cyst in the epidermis.
A mapping where the domain is a subset of the image.
